name: LingvaNex
natural_language_description: 这是 LingvaNex 节点。主要用于: Consume LingvaNex API

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: translate

text.name: text
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: The input text to translate | (必填项)

translateTo.name: translateTo
translateTo.description: The language to use for translation of the input text, set to one of the language codes listed in Language Support. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
translateTo.natural_language_description: 参数名: Translate To | 作用: The language to use for translation of the input text, set to one of the language codes listed in Language Support. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: from (值: None) - The language code in the format “language code_code of the country”. If this parameter is not present, the auto-detect language mode is enabled. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

translateMode (值: None) - Describe the input text format. Possible value is "html" for translating and preserving html structure. If value is not specified or is other than "html" than plain text is translating.

output_contract.standardizer_logic: return { payload: { primary: upstream.text || upstream.translatedText || upstream } }
